channel.title: Codes on Danny Freese - Coding for a Living
channel.description: Recent content in Codes on Danny Freese - Coding for a Living

item.title: How to Write an Ansible Module Unit Test in the Ansible Collection Paradigm
item.description: This tutorial will cover two major issues. One - how to setup your local workstation to build and test an ansible collection, and two - resolving a mac error related to cgroups. We will finish with a helloworld unit test to validate.

item.title: Ansible - How to Install Docker and Connect to the Docker Daemon Immediately
item.description: Situation: I need to install docker and then the user immediately be able to reach the docker daemon all in the same playbook.
